divs: sighting detailsi saw two other mufon reports of something similar in the chicago area recently so i will try and share the video and photos i have of it on this site. i have seen this gold, copper, orange sphere ufo several times during the day over the past month; 4\29, 5\22 and again yesterday may 27,2011 at 315pm cdt. i have also recorded this type of craft a few times before since 2009. i watched the slow moving sparkling gold morphing sphere of light noiselessly glide over the city for about 4 minutes. my camcorder is brand new hd sony but for some reason when i tried focusing in on the object the screen blurred or possibly the object was disapearing and re appearing. it started as a small point of light, it was east over the city then came west towards forest park. maybe this is what the other witnesses saw. *(moved to additional information section -- cms\sg). thanks for reading.
Summary: Gold sphere over Chicago 27 May 2011 UFO HD Video + Photos Uploaded on Youtube
trends: There have been 15 other sightings in Forest Park
There were no other sightings in Forest Park on or around May 27th 2011
This sighting has never been favorited.
